New Records: Glenn Phillips became the first batter to score a century in World Cups while coming in to bat in the middle order.
Phillips joins former Kiwi skipper Brendon McCullum as the only two New Zealanders to hit a T20 World Cup hundred.
Key Match Events: Phillips took on the mantle for the Kiwis and started smashing the ball around after Kane Williamson departed.
Phillips completed his century in just 61 balls, smashing 10 boundaries and 4 sixes against the Sri Lankans.
Phillips was eventually dismissed by Lahiru Kumara, getting caught by Dasun Shanaka after slicing a short ball, only to chip it high towards long-off running in.
